2025.title: Global IoT market to reach $1.06 trillion in 2025
2025.description: The Internet of Things market is expected to witness a significant surge in revenue, reaching a staggering $1.06 trillion by 2025 worldwide.

2025.title: IoT market size estimated at $76.97 billion in 2025
2025.description: The global internet of things (IoT) market size is calculated at $76.97 billion in 2025 and is forecasted to reach around $356.23 billion by 2034, expanding at a CAGR of 18.56%.

2025.title: Industrial IoT market to hit $289B in 2024, $847B by 2033
2025.description: The global Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) market size reached $289 billion in 2024 and is projected to reach $847 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 12.7% during 2025-2033.

2025.title: Enterprise IoT market growth to accelerate at 14% CAGR
2025.description: In 2025, the enterprise IoT market growth is forecasted to re-accelerate, growing at 14% CAGR through 2030, driven by AI integration, cloud/edge computing, and sustainability.

2025.title: IoT chips market valued at $619.14B in 2025
2025.description: The global IoT chips market size was $539.44 billion in 2024, accounted for $619.14 billion in 2025, and is expected to reach around $2,140 billion by 2034, growing at a CAGR of 14.77%.

2025.title: IoT monetization market valued at $1.01T in 2024
2025.description: The global IoT monetization market size was valued at $1.01 trillion in 2024 and is estimated to grow at 46.4% CAGR from 2025 to 2034, driven by extensive usage of IoT devices across industries.

2025.title: IoT market to grow from $629.5B in 2025 to $1.52T in 2029
2025.description: The IoT market size will grow from $535.97 billion in 2024 to $629.5 billion in 2025 at a CAGR of 17.5%, and is expected to reach $1,520.12 billion in 2029 at a CAGR of 24.7%.

2025.title: Android Studio Koala
2025.description: Android Studio Koala is the latest IDE version in 2025, focusing on improved performance, Kotlin Multiplatform support, and integrated AI assistance via Gemini in Android Studio. It introduces an upgraded Compose UI preview, live editing, and enhanced emulator tools.

2025.title: Matter 1.3 Release
2025.description: Matter 1.3, released in May 2025, expands smart home interoperability with support for new device types like robot vacuums, ovens, and EV chargers. It also improves energy reporting and multi-admin functionality, strengthening the open-source IoT ecosystem.

2025.title: Raspberry Pi 5 IoT Expansion Kits
2025.description: Raspberry Pi Foundation introduced new IoT-focused expansion kits for Raspberry Pi 5 in March 2025, including integrated sensors, edge ML support, and compatibility with the Matter protocol, making rapid IoT prototyping more accessible.

2025.title: Google Cloud IoT Core Successor Launched
2025.description: In February 2025, Google unveiled a new scalable IoT platform under Google Cloud, replacing IoT Core. It supports MQTT, HTTP, and seamless integration with Vertex AI for smart edge analytics and automation.

2025.title: Azure Sphere Public Preview with RTOS Enhancements
2025.description: Microsoft’s Azure Sphere received a major update in January 2025, including real-time operating system (RTOS) enhancements, faster OTA updates, and expanded device support for secure industrial IoT applications.

2025.title: ESP32-C6 Gains Mainstream Adoption
2025.description: The ESP32-C6, Espressif’s low-power Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5 LE chip, became widely adopted in Q1 2025. It is praised for its affordable performance in smart sensors, wearables, and connected appliances.
